name: EDENA
description: EDENA Capital Partners operates a globally integrated Security Token Offering (STO) exchange platform that bridges traditional finance and blockchain technology. The platform enables fractional ownership of premium assets, making institutional-grade investments accessible from as low as $1. EDENA addresses inefficiencies in the $400+ trillion global securities market by providing 24/7 trading capabilities, instant T+0 settlement, and seamless cross-border transactions. The platform specializes in tokenizing multiple asset classes including real estate, carbon credits, government bonds, Exchange-Traded Funds (ETFs), and Real Estate Investment Trusts (REITs). The company has secured regulatory approvals across multiple jurisdictions. EDENA holds approval from the Securities and Exchange Regulator of Cambodia (SERC) and is preparing for launch in Indonesia through the OJK regulatory sandbox program. Strategic partnerships include an alliance with BEK Group, led by former Egyptian Prime Minister Ibrahim Mahlab, providing exclusive territorial rights across 70 countries
